Users can always refuse to supply personal identification details, only that it may preclude them from engaging in certain site related activities.  ‍Non-Personal Identification Information: ‍We may collect non-personal identification about Users in the course of their interaction with our site. Non-personal identification information about users means of connection to our site, such as the operating system and the Internet Service Providers utilized and other similar information.
